caption:
This Earth Day, we’re proud to reveal our new sustainable refills 🌍

In partnership with Pulpex, we’re launching the world’s first commercial use of their sustainable fibre-based bottles as two shower refills – a groundbreaking step forward in eco-conscious beauty.

Crafted from PEFC-accredited and FSC-certified wood pulp, these innovative bottles are designed to be recycled with your household paper and card. 

Now available as great-value 550ml refills of our bestselling African Orange Aromatic Hand & Body Wash and Superfood Shine Shampoo, this marks a major milestone in our mission to create beauty that’s pure, proven, and purposeful.

Join us in celebrating Earth Day with a step toward a greener future. We’d love to know what you think of our new packaging – share your thoughts below! 💬
